tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crime_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_category VARCHAR(50),
    crime_location VARCHAR(100), 
    crime_date DATE,
    crime_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE crime_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  location POINT,
  reported_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE crime_hotspots (
  hotspot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location POINT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  severity ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High'),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE crimes (
  crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  crime_location VARCHAR(100),
  crime_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE crime_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_description TEXT,
  crime_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES crimes(crime_id)
)

CREATE TABLE crime_hotspots (
  hotspot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hotspot_location VARCHAR(100),
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  reported_incidents INT
)

CREATE TABLE crime_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  crime_type VARCHAR(255),
  location POINT
)

CREATE TABLE crime_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE crime_categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE crime_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE crimes (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    description STRING,
    location STRING
)

CREATE TABLE suspects (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    age INT,
    gender STRING,
    arrested BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    address STRING,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_id UUID,
    suspect_id UUID,
    location_id UUID,
    report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE reports (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id UUID,
    officer_id UUID,
    details STRING,
    status STRING
)
